Products.productName: Samsung Series 4 80cm (32 inch) HD Ready LED Smart TV
Products.deliveryBy: Usually delivered and Installed in 9-10 days

features.title: Resolution: HD Ready (1366x768) | Refresh Rate: 50 hertz
features.description: Connectivity: 2 HDMI ports to connect set top box, Blu Ray players, gaming console | 2 USB ports to connect hard drives and other USB devices
features.sound: Sound : 30 Watts Output | Built-in Woofer: Power your entertainment with deep bass
features.options: Smart TV Features : Smart Plug and Play: Easily connect and view photos, music and videos from mobile phone or USB device | USB Tethering: Seamlessly connect to Internet with Mobile Data | Access YouTube instantly with one click
features.display: Display : HDR: A truly lifelike viewing experience | X-Reality Pro: Rediscover every detail | X-Protection PRO: Xtra Protection TV
features.warranty: Warranty Information: 1 year warranty provided by Sony from date of purchase
features.installation: Installation: For requesting installation/wall mounting/demo of this product once delivered, please directly call Sony support on 1800 103 7799 and provide product's model name as well as seller's details mentioned on the invoice
features.returnPolicy: Easy returns: This product is eligible for replacement within 10 days of delivery in case of any product defects, damage or features not matching the description provided
